trans-unit.source: As an employee of our company, an account with up to 25 users is available to you free of charge for the purpose of demonstrating Cryptshare.express to potential or existing customers and business partners.

seg-source.mrk: As an employee of our company, an account with up to 25 users is available to you free of charge for the purpose of demonstrating Cryptshare.express to potential or existing customers and business partners.

As an employee of our company, an account with up to 25 users is available to you free of charge for the purpose of demonstrating Cryptshare.express to potential or existing customers and business partners.

target.mrk: Als medewerker van ons bedrijf kunt u gratis gebruik maken van een account met maximaal 25 gebruikers om ons product Cryptshare.express aan potentiële of bestaande klanten en zakenpartners te demonstreren of te promoten.

trans-unit.source: Please note the following terms of use:

seg-source.mrk: Please note the following terms of use:
Please note the following terms of use:

target.mrk: Neem de volgende gebruiksvoorwaarden in acht:

trans-unit.source: Only commercial/business users may be created, no consumers.

seg-source.mrk: Only commercial/business users may be created, no consumers.
Only commercial/business users may be created, no consumers.

target.mrk: Alleen commerciële/zakelijke gebruikers mogen worden aangemaakt, geen consumenten.

trans-unit.source: Creating users must always be in the interest of befine Solutions AG, to its advantage, and on its cost..

seg-source.mrk: Creating users must always be in the interest of befine Solutions AG, to its advantage, and on its cost..
Creating users must always be in the interest of befine Solutions AG, to its advantage, and on its cost..

target.mrk: Gebruikers aanmaken moet altijd in het belang, in het voordeel en op rekening van befine Solutions AG zijn.

trans-unit.source: It is not permitted to use the account for private purposes.

seg-source.mrk: It is not permitted to use the account for private purposes.
It is not permitted to use the account for private purposes.

target.mrk: Het gebruik van het account voor privé-doeleinden is niet toegestaan.

trans-unit.source:
Early deletion of users (before the license period expires) is possible. This would have to be done by you deleting the respective user from within the policy settings.

We wish you much success in using Cryptshare.express.
befine Solutions AG

seg-source.mrk:

We wish you much success in using Cryptshare.express.
befine Solutions AG

Early deletion of users (before the license period expires) is possible. This would have to be done by you deleting the respective user from within the policy settings.

We wish you much success in using Cryptshare.express.
befine Solutions AG

target.mrk:
Het vroegtijdige verwijderen van gebruikers (voordat de licentie verloopt) is alleen mogelijk op uw verzoek door ze te verwijderen uit de beleidsinstellingen.

We wensen u veel succes bij het gebruik van Cryptshare.express.
befine Solutions AG

trans-unit.source: By placing the order, I declare to abide by the terms of use as stated above.

seg-source.mrk: By placing the order, I declare to abide by the terms of use as stated above.
By placing the order, I declare to abide by the terms of use as stated above.

target.mrk: Door het plaatsen van een bestelling verklaar ik mij akkoord met de bovenstaande gebruiksvoorwaarden.
